import React, { useState } from 'react'; const ContactPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phoneNumber: '', details: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission logic here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; return (
